mapper.sql: id, encrypt_id, name, sex, birthday, teleno, id_card, lp_prov_id, lp_prov_name, lp_city_id, lp_city_name, lp_area_id, lp_area_name, live_place, hr_prov_id, hr_prov_name, hr_city_id, hr_city_name, hr_area_id, hr_area_name, household_register, medical_card_type, medical_card_id, nation_id, nation_name, occupation, employment_situation, education_levels, marital_status, doctor_id, doctor_name, hospital_id, hospital_name, create_time, patient_id, is_diabetes, diabetes_diagnosis_date, diabetes_status, is_hypertension, hypertension_diagnosis_date, hypertension_status, diseases_other, oculo_is_glaucoma, oculo_is_dr, oculo_other, family_is_glaucoma, family_is_hypertension, family_other, smoke, drink, sport, electr_time, last_update_time, is_delete
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE `t_customer` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键ID', `encrypt_id` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '加密ID', `name` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '患者姓名', `sex` int(1) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '患者性别（0男，1女）', `birthday` date DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '生日', `teleno` varchar(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '患者手机号码', `id_card` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '身份证号码', `lp_prov_id` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '居住地省份ID', `lp_prov_name` varchar(16) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '居住地省份', `lp_city_id` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '居住地城市ID', `lp_city_name` varchar(16) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '居住地城市', `lp_area_id` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '居住地区ID', `lp_area_name` varchar(16) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '居住地区', `live_place` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '居住地详细地址', `hr_prov_id` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '户籍省份ID', `hr_prov_name` varchar(16) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '户籍省份', `hr_city_id` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '户籍城市ID', `hr_city_name` varchar(16) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '户籍城市', `hr_area_id` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '户籍区域ID', `hr_area_name` varchar(16) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '户籍区域', `household_register` varchar(256) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '户籍地址详细地址', `medical_card_type` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '就医卡类型(1：医保卡，2：本院就诊卡)', `medical_card_id` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '就医卡卡号', `nation_id` int(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '名族ID', `nation_name` varchar(16) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '民族', `occupation` varchar(16) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '职业', `employment_situation` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '从业情况', `education_levels` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '文化程度(1：小学、2：初中、3：高中、4：本科、5：硕士、6：博士)', `marital_status` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '婚姻状况(1：已婚、2：未婚、3：离异)', `doctor_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建患者的医生ID', `doctor_name` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建患者的医生姓名', `hospital_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建患者医生所在医院ID', `hospital_name` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建患者医生所在医院名称', `create_time` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', `patient_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '基础表里患者表患者ID', `is_diabetes` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '是否有糖尿病（0：否，1：是）', `diabetes_diagnosis_date` date DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '糖尿病确诊时间', `diabetes_status` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '血糖控制情况（1:低，2:良好，3:高）', `is_hypertension` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '是否有高血压（0：否，1：是）', `hypertension_diagnosis_date` date DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '高血压确诊时间', `hypertension_status` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '血压控制情况（1：低，2：良好，3：高）', `diseases_other` varchar(256) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '其他疾病史', `oculo_is_glaucoma` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '眼病史是否有青光眼（0：否，1：是）', `oculo_is_dr` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '眼病史是否有糖尿病视网膜病变（0：否，1：是）', `oculo_other` varchar(256) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '其他眼病史', `family_is_glaucoma` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '家族史是否有青光眼（0：否，1：是）', `family_is_hypertension` int(1) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '家族史是否有高血压（0：否，1：是）', `family_other` varchar(256) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '家族史其他病史', `smoke` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '吸烟', `drink` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '喝酒', `sport` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '运动', `electr_time` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '电子产品使用时间', `last_update_time` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '最后更新时间', `is_delete` int(1) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '删除标志（0：未删除，1：已删除）', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='患者信息';
mapper.select: select encrypt_id from t_customer where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

hr_prov_name, hr_city_id, hr_city_name, hr_area_id, hr_area_name, household_register, medical_card_type, medical_card_id, nation_id, nation_name, occupation, employment_situation, education_levels, marital_status, doctor_id, doctor_name, hospital_id, hospital_name, create_time, patient_id, is_diabetes, diabetes_diagnosis_date, diabetes_status, is_hypertension, hypertension_diagnosis_date, hypertension_status, diseases_other, oculo_is_glaucoma, oculo_is_dr, oculo_other, family_is_glaucoma, family_is_hypertension, family_other, smoke, drink, sport, electr_time, last_update_time, is_delete) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{encryptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{teleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update t_customer
encrypt_id = #{encryptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
teleno = #{teleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lp_prov_id = #{lpProvId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lp_prov_name = #{lpProvName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lp_city_id = #{lpCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lp_city_name = #{lpCityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lp_area_id = #{lpAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lp_area_name = #{lpAreaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
live_place = #{livePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hr_prov_id = #{hrProvId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hr_prov_name = #{hrProvName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hr_city_id = #{hrCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hr_city_name = #{hrCityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hr_area_id = #{hrAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hr_area_name = #{hrAreaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
household_register = #{householdRegister,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medical_card_type = #{medicalCardType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
medical_card_id = #{medicalCardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nation_id = #{nationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nation_name = #{nationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
occupation = #{occupation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employment_situation = #{employmentSituation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
education_levels = #{educationLevels,jdbcType=INTEGER},
marital_status = #{maritalStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
doctor_name = #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hospital_id = #{hospitalId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hospital_name = #{hospitalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_diabetes = #{isDiabetes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
diabetes_diagnosis_date = #{diabetesDiagnosisDate,jdbcType=DATE},
diabetes_status = #{diabetesStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_hypertension = #{isHypertension,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hypertension_diagnosis_date = #{hypertensionDiagnosisDate,jdbcType=DATE},
hypertension_status = #{hypertensionStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
diseases_other = #{diseasesOther,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oculo_is_glaucoma = #{oculoIsGlaucoma,jdbcType=INTEGER},
oculo_is_dr = #{oculoIsDr,jdbcType=INTEGER},
oculo_other = #{oculoOther,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
family_is_glaucoma = #{familyIsGlaucoma,jdbcType=INTEGER},
family_is_hypertension = #{familyIsHypertension,jdbcType=INTEGER},
family_other = #{familyOther,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
smoke = #{smoke,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drink = #{drink,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sport = #{sport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
electr_time = #{electrTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
